name.baseName: Biologicaldrugs(excludingbloodproducts)|Animaltissuesororgans|Biochemical extraction process|greater than or equal to1000 kg/a
生物药品（不含血液制品）|动物组织或器官|生化提取工艺|大于等于1000千克/年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisWithout terminal treatment technology，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisWithout terminal treatment technology，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的生化提取工艺用于生产纳米生物药品（不含血液制品），规模在每年1000公斤或以上。这些工艺通常涉及从动物组织或器官中提取特定的生化化合物。末端处理技术对于维护环境标准至关重要，它涉及废水、化学需氧量（COD）、氨氮、有机结合氮、总磷和挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）等污染物的处理。文中提到了多种具有相应技术效率的处理技术。这些技术被整合到工业设施中，以减少废排放对环境的影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,三级代码276.0文件，在完整版文件中第3202页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + anoxic/aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物化处理+厌氧生物处理+缺氧/好氧生物处理，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anoxic/aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.5，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物化处理+缺氧/好氧生物处理，其效率为98.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic hydrolysis + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97.7，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物化处理+厌氧水解+好氧生物处理，其效率为97.7，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96.5，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物化处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为96.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisOther，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是其他，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical treatment + anoxic/aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物化处理+缺氧/好氧生物处理，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（天）/正常生产时间（天。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative catalytic combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是蓄热式催化燃烧法，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.8，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
